steps.conclusion: None. The output respects language (Portuguese), provides a valid single-topic title without levels/joiners, includes english_title, icon with tabler- prefix, and sets is_language_course to false.

Only one suggestion was provided despite a vague input where multiple canonical options would be appropriate. While allowed, the instructions encourage generating as many relevant suggestions as needed; including more (e.g., Ciência da Computação, Desenvolvimento Web, Engenharia de Software) would better meet expectations.

- Add more broad canonical course suggestions for a vague intent (e.g., Ciência da Computação, Desenvolvimento Web, Engenharia de Software).
- Vary icons to match each suggestion if more are added.
- Keep titles concise and single-topic as already done.
